ul.li: Santa Clara Valley, California, United States

div.p: Apple’s mCAD group is looking for a training and support engineer with excellent interpersonal skills, CAD and Data Management training and support experience to work with the world’s most creative engineers and designers. As a trainer/support engineer within the mCAD group, you will be tasked with supporting Apple’s NX and Teamcenter users in their daily work, assure that problems are properly captured and solutions are provided in a timely and efficient manner. You will work with mCAD subject matter experts (SMEs) and solution architect in developing new NX/Teamcenter Integration initiatives to support Apple’s Product Designers business needs and introducing solutions and technologies for implementation.

ul.li: Technical or engineering degree (Mechanical preferred), or equivalent technical training with 5+ years of relevant professional experience
Solid working knowledge of NX and Teamcenter Unified
Working knowledge with NX integration or any other integration with Teamcenter is highly
Able to work in a very dynamic environment
Familiarity with Mac products and OS is desirable

div.p: - Provide mCAD training and Application support for a variety of mCAD environment tools. - Design and Develop content for assigned modules of training programs with complete ownership of the modules ensuring high quality - Perform test engineering responsibilities for mCAD feature releases Collaborate with the mCAD team and their customers to develop solutions
Technical degree in Mechanical Engineering / Computer Science or related discipline
